    Building Lessons With A Package Cache Working with Automated Pull Requests

  • Changelog

Remove all files associated with the site

Source: R/reset_site.R
reset_site.Rd

Use this if you want to rebuild your site from scratch.

Usage

reset_site(path = ".")

Arguments

path

the path to the site

Examples

tmp <- tempfile()
create_lesson(tmp)
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/Rtmpi1M5Yh/file16c14a1bd491...
#> ℹ No schedule set, using Rmd files in episodes/ directory.
#> → Creating Lesson in /tmp/Rtmpi1M5Yh/file16c14a1bd491...

#> /tmp/Rtmpi1M5Yh/file16c14a1bd491
build_lesson(tmp, preview = FALSE)
dir(file.path(tmp, "site"))
#> [1] "DESCRIPTION"   "README.md"     "_pkgdown.yaml" "built"        
#> [5] "docs"         
reset_site(tmp)
dir(file.path(tmp, "site"))
#> [1] "DESCRIPTION"   "README.md"     "_pkgdown.yaml" "built"

On this page

Developed by Zhian N. Kamvar.

Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
